testcase.name: Refresh the access token
testcase.system-out: * call read('classpath:reusable.feature') ................................. passed * call read('classpath:Citibank/EPP/CardAuthorization.feature') ........... passed * call read('classpath:Citibank/EPP/CardAuthorizationAccessToken.feature') . passed Given url 'https://sandbox.apihub.citi.com/gcb/api/cardAuth/oauth2/refresh' . passed And header Authorization = 'Basic ZjJmMDhjMTQtOGU1My00YjEzLTg2MmMtYmRmMTgyZDQ2ZGY5Olk4eVAzYk43Z1MzbFEwYUMzd0UwcVkzb0M0Z1Uwa0swc0kxdUk1aEY2d0Y2cUw0a0Ez' . passed And header client_id = 'f2f08c14-8e53-4b13-862c-bdf182d46df9' ............. passed And header uuid = randomString(20) ........................................ passed And header Accept = 'application/json' .................................... passed And header Content-Type = 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded' ............. passed And form field grant_type = 'refresh_token' ............................... passed And form field refresh_token = refreshToken ............................... passed When method post .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed * print response .......................................................... passed * match response.refresh_token == '#string' ............................... passed * match response.refresh_token_expires_in == '#number' .................... passed * def refreshAccessToken = response.access_token .......................... passed * print 'Refresh Access Token : '+refreshAccessToken ...................... passed * def refreshTokenNew = response.refresh_token ............................ passed * def resfreshTokenExpireIn = response.refresh_token_expires_in ........... passed * print 'Refresh Access Token : '+refreshTokenNew ......................... passed * print 'Expiration Duration : '+resfreshTokenExpireIn .................... passed * print '*********Refresh Token Generated*********' ....................... passed
